actionTemplate.title: Narrow wide nostrils with wing contour
steps: Keep the bridge highlight thin; avoid widening near the root
Shade along the sidewall and around the nostril edge
On each wing, draw a small parenthesis shadow and blend inward
Add a tiny highlight at the wing base to soften the edge

rationaleTemplate: Focused wing shading reduces nostril width visually
Thin highlight keeps the nose from looking broader
